column5: Hope this has not been posted already.  There's a fishing show that has a chef on it and after they fish, they cook the catch.  Guess they're only cooking up one fish now  http://www.uproxx.com/videos/2013/10/sneaky-sea-lion-steals-giant-fish-fishermans-hands/
saw this on the news, me and my dad had a good laugh for me that would be a perfect reason to keep fishin
apparently the sea lion has a name and is known to do this
That's wild.  Almost got the guys hand!
Tug of war might of been a bit of fun???maybe?  .They seem to show no fear of humans.Pretty funny!!
Thats funny, and cool..Thanks for sharing that
